short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a QR code based on your selection or any link so you can easily share it with any device.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this Chrome Extension you can easily create a QR code by right-clicking your selection or link. When text is selected, you can right-click that selection and have the option to create a QR code one of 3 things: text, phone number or SMS. 

The "QR Code text or link" will create a QR code that you can scan that will simply copy over the selection or the link you just right-clicked on.

The "QR Code phone" will create a QR code that your device can easily parse as a phone number. That way you can easily call the selected phone number. 

The "QR Code SMS" will create a QR code that your device can parse as text for a new SMS. When scanning this QR code, you'll still have to provide a phone number to which the SMS needs to be sent to. The content however will be pre-filled by your selection.

To close the QR code in your browser, simply click anywhere on the screen.
